text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo Why are they sitting so close to each other?  Is the photo from today?   Dumb, very Dumb.   What is wrong with you Trump you idiot?  You have the WH staff getting coronavirus and YOU'RE HOLDING AN IN PERSON MEETING with our cabinet leadership and top military? God are you STUPID!
